# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a voice trait with the corresponding integer that you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The integer that corresponds with the voice trait.
title: init(rawValue:)
